main event: A woman and three girls observed a strange object land and take off in West Middletown, Ohio on November 4, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as huge, glowing, and emitting flames, observed by the witnesses around 6:30 p.m.,The object was surrounded by a bluish-green light and left an impression on the ground that resembled a Christmas tree.,Mrs. Tucker noted that the object did not resemble any known aircraft and appeared controlled.,As the object took off, it knocked out the TV signal and flickered the lights in nearby homes.,The Air Force was scheduled to investigate the sighting the following day.
witness description: a woman and three teenage girls
